amendment.description: To clarify the role of the Cherokee Nation of Oklahoma regarding the maintenance of the W.D. Mayo Lock and Dam in the State of Oklahoma.

vote.text: Amendment SA 895 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 895 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 895 proposed by Senator Vitter for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 895 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
